- start timer
- put numbers into container
- give numbers ranks

use vector and list? or vector and deque for random access

use class as a struct

./PmergeMe `shuf -i 1-100000 -n 3000 | tr "\n" " "`

11 2 17 0 16 8 6 15 10 3 21 1 18 9 14 19 12 5 4 20 13 7

allow both 1 2 3 and "1 2 3" as inputs

DOESNT SORT WITH
